verses.kjv: Not unto us, O LORD, not unto us, but unto thy name give glory, for thy mercy, and for thy truth’s sake.
verses.ct: Not to us, LORD, not to us, but to your name bring glory, because of your mercy and your faithfulness.

verses.kjv: Wherefore should the heathen say, Where is now their God?
verses.ct: Why should the nations ask, "Where is their God now?"

verses.kjv: But our God is in the heavens: he hath done whatsoever he hath pleased.
verses.ct: Our God is in the heavens; he does whatever he chooses.

verses.kjv: Their idols are silver and gold, the work of men’s hands.
verses.ct: Their idols are made of silver and gold, crafted by human hands.

verses.kjv: They have mouths, but they speak not: eyes have they, but they see not:
verses.ct: They have mouths but cannot speak. They have eyes but cannot see.

verses.kjv: They have ears, but they hear not: noses have they, but they smell not:
verses.ct: They have ears but cannot hear. They have noses but cannot smell.

verses.kjv: They have hands, but they handle not: feet have they, but they walk not: neither speak they through their throat.
verses.ct: They have hands but cannot feel. They have feet but cannot walk. No sound comes from their throats.

verses.kjv: They that make them are like unto them; so is every one that trusteth in them.
verses.ct: The people who make them will end up just like them, and so will everyone who puts their trust in them.

verses.kjv: O Israel, trust thou in the LORD: he is their help and their shield.
verses.ct: Israel, put your trust in the LORD — he is their protector and their shield.

verses.kjv: O house of Aaron, trust in the LORD: he is their help and their shield.
verses.ct: House of Aaron, put your trust in the LORD — he is their protector and their shield.

verses.kjv: Ye that fear the LORD, trust in the LORD: he is their help and their shield.
verses.ct: You who are wholeheartedly dedicated to the LORD, put your trust in the LORD — he is their protector and their shield.

verses.kjv: The LORD hath been mindful of us: he will bless us; he will bless the house of Israel; he will bless the house of Aaron.
verses.ct: The LORD has remembered us and will bless us. He will bless the house of Israel. He will bless the house of Aaron.

verses.kjv: He will bless them that fear the LORD, both small and great.
verses.ct: He will bless those who are wholeheartedly dedicated to the LORD, from the least important to the greatest.

verses.kjv: The LORD shall increase you more and more, you and your children.
verses.ct: May the LORD cause you to prosper more and more — both you and your children.

verses.kjv: Ye are blessed of the LORD which made heaven and earth.
verses.ct: You are blessed by the LORD, who made heaven and earth.

verses.kjv: The heaven, even the heavens, are the LORD’s: but the earth hath he given to the children of men.
verses.ct: The heaven, the very heavens, belong to the LORD, but the earth he has given to humanity.

verses.kjv: The dead praise not the LORD, neither any that go down into silence.
verses.ct: The dead do not praise the LORD, nor do any who descend into silence.

verses.kjv: But we will bless the LORD from this time forth and for evermore. Praise the LORD.
verses.ct: But we will praise the LORD from now until forever. Praise the LORD!
